item0.name: Turbo Chemtank
item0.description:
350 Health
25 Armor
25 Magic Resist
20 Ability Haste

Active - Supercharged: Grants 75% Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that Slows nearby champions by 40% for 1.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste

item1.name: Spirit Visage
item1.description:
450 Health
40 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
100% Base Health Regen
  • Boundless Vitality: Increases all Healing and Shielding effectiveness on you by 25%.

item2.name: Control Ward
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item3.name: Dead Man's Plate
item3.description:
400 Health
40 Armor
5% Move Speed
  • Shipwrecker: While moving, build up to 60 bonus Move Speed. Your next Attack discharges built up Move Speed to deal up to 100 magic damage. If dealt by a Melee champion at top speed, the Attack also Slows the target by 50% for 1 second.

    ''There's only one way you'll get this armor from me...'' - forgotten namesake

item5.name: Plated Steelcaps
item5.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Fleet Footwork
perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.3 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

item0.name: Spirit Visage
item0.description:
450 Health
40 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
100% Base Health Regen
  • Boundless Vitality: Increases all Healing and Shielding effectiveness on you by 25%.

item1.name: Refillable Potion
item1.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

item2.name: Turbo Chemtank
item2.description:
350 Health
25 Armor
25 Magic Resist
20 Ability Haste

Active - Supercharged: Grants 75% Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that Slows nearby champions by 40% for 1.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste

item3.name: Thornmail
item3.description:
350 Health
60 Armor
  • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal (10 + 10% bonus Armor) magic damage to the attacker and apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion. Immobilizing enemy champions also applies 60% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item4.name: Plated Steelcaps
item4.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

item0.name: Sunfire Aegis
item0.description:
350 Health
30 Armor
30 Magic Resist
15 Ability Haste
  • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 100% against monsters) for 3 seconds. Damaging Champions or Epic Monsters with this effect adds a stack, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 10% for 5 seconds (max stacks 6).
  • Flametouch: At maximum Immolate stacks, your Attacks burn nearby enemies for your Immolate damage per second for 3 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Tenacity and Slow Resist.

item1.description:

45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item2.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item2.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item3.name: Force of Nature
item3.description:
350 Health
60 Magic Resist
5% Move Speed
  • Absorb: Taking damage from Abilities grants you 8 Move Speed and 4 Magic Resist for 5 seconds (stacks up to 5 times; each unique Ability instance can give one stack).

item5.name: Thornmail
item5.description:
350 Health
60 Armor
  • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal (10 + 10% bonus Armor) magic damage to the attacker and apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion. Immobilizing enemy champions also applies 60% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Fleet Footwork
perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:

item0.name: Frostfire Gauntlet
item0.description:
350 Health
25 Armor
25 Magic Resist
20 Ability Haste
  • Immolate : Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.
  • Snowbind: Attacks create a frost field for 1.5 seconds (4s cooldown). Enemies that move across the field are Slowed by 25% (increased by your max Health).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 100 Health and 6% Size.

item1.name: Randuin's Omen
item1.description:
250 Health
80 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active: Humility: Briefly Slow nearby enemies and reduce their Attack Damage by 10% and Critical Strike Damage by 20% for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to (0.5% max Health), capped at 40% of the attack's damage.

item3.name: Mercury's Treads
item3.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item2.description:
350 Health
25 Armor
25 Magic Resist
20 Ability Haste

Active - Supercharged: Grants 75% Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that Slows nearby champions by 40% for 1.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
  • Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste

item3.name: Plated Steelcaps
item3.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Fleet Footwork
perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.3 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

item1.name: Randuin's Omen
item1.description:
250 Health
80 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active: Humility: Briefly Slow nearby enemies and reduce their Attack Damage by 10% and Critical Strike Damage by 20% for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to (0.5% max Health), capped at 40% of the attack's damage.

item2.name: Spirit Visage
item2.description:
450 Health
40 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
100% Base Health Regen
  • Boundless Vitality: Increases all Healing and Shielding effectiveness on you by 25%.

item3.name: Mercury's Treads
item3.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.
